blueprint.arc_description: Starts with a heroic build-up, transitions into a high-energy rhythmic montage of action, and concludes with a sense of legacy and power.
blueprint.narrative_message: A high-octane tribute to the legacy and adrenaline-fueled world of elite naval aviation.
should_have_content: Solemn moments to balance high energy
blueprint.overall_reasoning: The edit leverages a high-energy trap remix of the iconic Top Gun theme to drive a fast-paced montage of the film's most visually striking moments. It balances intense cockpit close-ups with wide, sweeping shots of jets in action, creating a sense of both personal stakes and epic scale. The pacing accelerates in the middle with rapid-fire cuts synced to the beat, then resolves with more reflective, legacy-focused imagery.
ideal_material_suggestions: High-speed vehicle footage with dynamic camera angles.
Close-ups of focused individuals showing physical strain or determination.
Sweeping landscape shots at golden hour.
Group activities or formations that imply teamwork and legacy.
Powerful machinery (jets, engines, cars) in high-motion states.
